media.headline: Triggs turns two on comebacker
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Triggs snags a liner, turns a double play
media.bigblurb: Andrew Triggs snags a line drive off the bat of Eduardo Nunez and tosses to third base to complete the 1-5 double play

media.headline: Healy's smooth sliding play
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Healy makes tough sliding stop
media.bigblurb: Ryon Healy makes a smooth sliding stop on a well-hit ball to the right of the second-base bag, tosses to first base to complete the out

media.headline: Hundley's grand slam
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Hundley blasts a grand slam to left field
media.bigblurb: Nick Hundley launches a grand slam to left field in the top of the 4th inning, giving the Giants a 4-2 lead

media.headline: Joyce's two-run double
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Joyce rips a two-run double to right field
media.bigblurb: Matt Joyce laces a two-run double to the right-field wall in the bottom of the 3rd inning, giving the A's an early 2-0 lead

media.headline: Graveman on starting Opening Day
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Graveman discusses upcoming Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Kendall Graveman discusses his excitement for his upcoming Opening Day start and how he plans to prepare for it

media.headline: Phegley's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Phegley rips an RBI double to left field
media.bigblurb: Josh Phegley rips an RBI double to left field in the bottom of the 6th inning, bringing the A's to within a run

media.headline: Ruggiano's two-run home run
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Ruggiano blasts a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Justin Ruggiano crushes a two-run home run over the left-field wall, extending the Giants' lead to 6-3

media.headline: Moronta nails down the save
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Moronta induces groundout to complete save
media.bigblurb: Reyes Moronta induces a 6-3 groundout to complete the save and preserve the Giants' 6-3 victory

media.headline: Nunez, Hill turn double play
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Giants' middle infield turns two
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Nunez ranges up the middle and glove flips to Aaron Hill at second base to start a 6-4-3 double play

media.headline: Beede K's five over four innings
media.blurb: SF@OAK: Beede fans five in final spring start
media.bigblurb: Tyler Beede strikes out five batters over four innings in his last start of Spring Training
